code: import{ADD_TO_CART,REMOVE_FROM_CART,CLEAR_CART}from"../constants";export var addToCart=function addToCart(payload){return{type:ADD_TO_CART,payload:payload};};export var removeFromCart=function removeFromCart(payload){return{type:REMOVE_FROM_CART,payload:payload};};export var clearCart=function clearCart(){return{type:CLEAR_CART};};
